title: [Hollard Street story]
creator_credit: J. Blake Dalrymple and Films of Africa
brief_description: Growth of South Africa’s economy and the corresponding expansion of the nation’s trading house, the Johannesburg Stock Exchange, from the gold rush days to the era of industrial security.
